item.title: My Terminal Setup
item.description: As a software engineer, I find myself using terminal as the de facto way to work. It offers a highly customizable text based interface that would otherwise be complicated if it’s a UI based interface. How it helps me to be productive depends on how I configure it. So here I present my own terminal setup. I’ll go through what I install (and later I’ll explain its functionality). ZSH Install ZSH sudo apt install zsh Set WSL to run ZSH by default .
